tweet: Oh my goodness and there is an actual POSTER and a little drawing of Pinter and I am very very happy!
Just got the first chapter of The Meek in the mail, and I'm very, very impressed.  Made for print.  The whole thing turned out just perfect!
Work's over, and nobody got popped in the nose.  More of the same tomorrow.  Can't wait for monday.  Class'll be a nice break.
Actually made it home before midnight.  Now to do it all over again tomorrow.
